website_summaries.verdict: Your next smoothie mix-in ingredient must-have. All natural, fiber substitute and healthy option to add to desserts, baked-goods, and more.
pros: Keeps you full for hours if mixed into shakes and smoothies
Good way to eat more omega-3 fatty acids
Long sifting process method keeps broken and whole seeds from occurring
cons: Doesn't dissolve in some liquids and seeds could be  hard to eat

customer_reviews.title: Contains harmful chemicals that may cause cancer or reproductive harm
customer_reviews.text: After receiving the item, there was a sticker stating the item may contain cancer or reproductive harm. After doing some research, it seems there are unsafe levels of a chemical that is known to cause cancer and reproductive harm in this item.
customer_reviews.author: matt slemmer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy and healthy!
customer_reviews.text: I normally get chia seeds to supplement my food like yogurt or cottage cheese. I love chia but when adding it to food it can take a while to soften and blend in. The flax seed blends in right away. This product has a nice, almost nutty flavor if it tastes like anything at all. The packaging is great. The bag is stiff and sits upright on the shelf of the fridge. Note, it's important to keep it in the fridge for freshness once it's opened. I would absolutely purchase from this brand again. It's a great deal and tastes delicious!
customer_reviews.author: LRRE

customer_reviews.title: I feed my Canaries with this product
customer_reviews.text: Just so you know I don't use this product for my own use but rather for my Canaries. I raise and breed Canaries, and have been doing so for over fifty years now, and try to feed them the best and healthiest diet that I can. Considering their lifespan is usually about five years, but most of mine go for about at least twice that time and some into their fifteen or sixteen years. I hope that you enjoy these pictures. Marty
customer_reviews.author: Martin Gartenberg

customer_reviews.title: Delivered intact!
customer_reviews.text: Product came as promised. I didnt have any issues. I just tried it today and its ground really fine. I had flaxseed that wasnt and this is way better. You can mix it with different things. My choice is a smoothie as Im trying to be a little more healthier. Mine doesnt expire until January 2019 for those wondering about expiration dates. Also I would order from the seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a good brand. The ground flax seeds are pretty fine; not clumpy at all. It appears fresh. I use them in my cereal and also to make no bake energy bites. I can get ground flax seeds in my local grocery store, but there's not much selection and the bag is very small. This bag is large, which is a good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jheneya

customer_reviews.title: Causes Cancer According to Prop 65 Label
customer_reviews.text: The back of this product has a Proposition 65 label stating the product causes cancer and reproductive harm. Unfortunately the pictures of the product here on Amazon are altered and don't show this warning prior to buying. I feel thats dishonest.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: ... to my morning yogurt and it not only tastes good but it has helped my stomach issues and using ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve added this to my morning yogurt and it not only tastes good but it has helped my stomach issues and using the restroom👍🏻 Taste reminds me of between graham crackers and almonds I like it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kyky

customer_reviews.title: MAY CAUSES CANCER AND REPRODUCTIVE HARM
customer_reviews.text: I'm really upset that I purchased this product and can't return it. This product may cause cancer and reproductive harm. The seller should have been transparent about this. I WOULD ADVISE PEOPLE NOT TO BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Always Punctured and Leaking
customer_reviews.text: Have been purchasing regularly for a year now, but the packing process is definitely lacking. My last two orders have arrived punctured and leaking into the box. Seeing as how these cannot be returned or replaced, you could see how this is a problem. I like the product, but I definitely cannot recommend under these circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Middleton

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: My first time purchasing. This product came with numerous pin holes in the bag. Also had dust all over the bag so I’m assuming it’s old, and the expiration date was worn off. I called and asked for a refund. I will not purchase again. Do not want to risk getting sick, so I threw it out. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Sara R.

customer_reviews.title: Chemical Odor/Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Just opened the bag and it smells "off"...there's some sort of chemical odor and flavor emitting from flax...already put it in a weeks worth of overnight oats and barely edible... apparently I'm outside the return/refund window but the bag is labeled "BEST BUY Jan 2020". Yet again...a good brand outgrows itself and loses quality control. Will be seeking a new supplier unless refunded in full.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Chrisman

customer_reviews.title: Not nearly as good as the last time I ordered it
customer_reviews.text: Not nearly as good as the last time I ordered it. Viva said they changed the packaging...that is not ALL they changed. The product itself is different. You can taste it. AND the texture changed....just NOT THE SAME. Forced again to try new brands AGAIN. I don't believe there is a chance that they will improve. Why can't companies just leave stuff alone???????
customer_reviews.author: Murtry

customer_reviews.title: seriously, a cancer warning?
customer_reviews.text: This "organic" product, arrived with a warning label about cancer. I would never have ordred this, if the online images disclosed this fact. I don't even understand it.. I've used flaxseed for years (not this brand) but, it is a wonderful product which promotes healty heart and aids digestion. ..but a side affect of cancer, is not accepatble. I can't believe Amazon allows them to sell this.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Kay

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT PRODUCT from Viva Labs
customer_reviews.text: I was talking to someone a few weeks ago and he was telling me that I added flaxseed to his oatmeal... and I wasn't quite sure that it was. So I went and looked it up on the internet. Sounded like something that I should try. So I looked for it on Amazon and found this product Viva Naturals - Organic Ground Flaxseed. I've been using it on my oatmeal, salads, soups, and the protein shakes. I've noticed the good change in my digestive tract. There is no taste to it. I'm glad I found this item available.
customer_reviews.author: Ron G from Central FL

customer_reviews.title: Rancid!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the package, I could immediately tell from the smell of the flax seed that it was rancid. I will never buy it again, nor should anyone else.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product 2 lower Triglycerides For Me
customer_reviews.text: I had triglycerides of 1200 & started using these & Omega 3 Fish oils & lowered to 300 n about 4 months Also started using real organic butter & olive oil Worked for me as I won’t take the corporate pharmaceuticals Dr wanted me too Too many side effects to risk it 4 my case Always check with Dr But u must be your own advocate & take responsibility 4 how & what u consume because meds can’t fix everything
customer_reviews.author: SuzyQ4JC

customer_reviews.title: Prop 65
customer_reviews.text: Harmful chemicals. Although its no where in the description, once I received the package, there was 2 stickers on the package per California law prop 65 alerting that it has known chemical that cause birth defects, and cancer. I was able to pull the complaint that this company currently has a lawsuit as of 2018 for not making it known that it's product has large amounts of lead. Pull it up on google if you like.
customer_reviews.author: honey_nunu_415

customer_reviews.title: Adjust your recipes in a healthy way
customer_reviews.text: Organic flaxseed is something new I am trying to add to my baking. My first recipe with this was "pumpkin energy balls", and they were amazing. The flaxseed is so nice because it works so well to thicken a recipe when it is too thin. I look forward to exploring new ways to use the flaxseed. Thi
customer_reviews.author: MRHARR

customer_reviews.title: I have never tried using Flaxseed but I would recommend this. I put on my cereal in the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have never tried using Flaxseed but I would recommend this. I put on my cereal in the morning and really gives me a full feeling, and this is healthy! Also I believe it keeps everything moving out of my system, I find it very helpful in relieving that full feeling.
customer_reviews.author: sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Flavorless additive but strong smell initially
customer_reviews.text: As several have noted, when the bag is first opened, there is a strong smell. It's not a big deal. This flaxseed has a strong, nutty aroma and, thanks to the airtight packaging, the scent builds up until the bag is opened. It's no different than opening a big can of ground coffee and getting hit with the coffee smell. The flaxseed is ground quite fine and I can't detect it in my fruit smoothies - neither taste nor texture. It's a good option for slipping in some extra nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: the package was broken, and leaking
customer_reviews.text: the package came to me leaking flax seed. I thought it broke during the shipment. However I found there was a huge tape trying to cover the slit on the package. So i was damaged before the package was sent out. the flax seeds was leaked all over the box. and this package is not allowed to return. Should I eat something in a broken package??? I
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Caused heart palpitations
customer_reviews.text: After reading many of the reviews for this flaxseed I felt confident that I had chosen the best. Unfortunately, after eating it I started having heart palpitations. At first, I didn't realize it was the flaxseed that was causing my palpitations until after sever days of eating it. I decided to stop and see if that made a difference in my heart rate. Sure enough! I have not eaten the flaxseed for several days and have not had any tachycardia issues!! I thought flaxseed was supposed to be good for your heart?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I love this, it arrived fresh, nice packaging but I am thinking I am going to buy large glass jars for these products. Once you start using it, it is difficult to pour or scoop. Package always doesn’t seal well.. but sealing packages except for sliders is always tricky at least for me.. Seems good quality, arrived fresh and as described. I purchase other products drom this company as well
customer_reviews.author: Ayca

customer_reviews.title: Healthy food
customer_reviews.text: Viva Naturals sells some pretty good products. I already got some chia seeds from them which were very good so I also bought some Flax Seeds to get the same level of quality. In the 30 Oz package (850g) you will get 100% Organic Cold-Milled Ground Flaxseeds. 2 Tbsp (14g) will give you 6 g of fat (4g f Polyunsaturated + 1g of Monounsaturated fat+ 0.5 g of saturated fat + 0.5g of ?), 3g of dietary fibers and 3g of proteins. I use it to make some home made spread paste with some almonds and other type of seeds (Chia, sunflower) and some flavored protein powders. 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Henri Savin

customer_reviews.title: It’s good for you.
customer_reviews.text: Poorage flaxseed bananas and hemp milk One tablespoon of ground flax seeds contains the following (1): Calories: 37 Protein: 1.3 grams Carbs: 2 grams Fiber: 1.9 grams Total fat: 3 grams Saturated fat: 0.3 grams Monounsaturated fat: 0.5 grams Polyunsaturated fat: 2.0 grams Omega-3 fatty acids: 1,597 mg Vitamin B1: 8% of the RDI Vitamin B6: 2% of the RDI Folate: 2% of the RDI Calcium: 2% of the RDI Iron: 2% of the RDI Magnesium: 7% of the RDI Phosphorus: 4% of the RDI Potassium: 2% of the RDI
customer_reviews.author: Matthew C.

customer_reviews.title: Seems like a great brand and product to me
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a great brand and product to me. It blends up nicely in my smoothie and the taste is great. Well, I don't really notice it changing the taste of the smoothie at all so to me that's a good thing. Quality appears good and I'm happy with the price. I really don't know how much this benefits my health but I feel good so why stop. I bought the 15oz bag with subscribe-and-save and I plan to keep buying them. I also got the Chia Seeds from VIVA which is also great.
customer_reviews.author: RickerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I dont want to say dont get it but mine was rancid
customer_reviews.text: Was fermented not good smelled bad so rancid I no these things happen sometimes but they refunded ms back which was so nice of them maybe I just happened fo get a bad batch Is all but let me tell u this is healthy like chia seeds if u have issues using bathroom yea those 2 seeds help just saying lol but there both so healthy I think I'm going to try the oil hoping that will work
customer_reviews.author: BellaDoll

customer_reviews.title: Be aware.
customer_reviews.text: I bought it cheap because the expiration date is in 2 months. But when I opened it, it smelled like oyster... not fresh oyster but the one in the middle of going bad. :( I am not sure if it's originally smelling like this or it's already gone bad. It shouldn't be bad already because it's not expired. I am confused and not sure if I can eat it....
customer_reviews.author: Jiyoung Han

customer_reviews.title: good but do not overdose
customer_reviews.text: a good product that yields the benefits of flaxseed. but caution not to overdose should be advised on package
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Berkowitz

customer_reviews.title: Try it.
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it. Flaxseed is not a product you buy because it tastes good. You buy it because of its natural health benefits. This is a very good product. I have found it to be fresh. The package is good stays fresh in the refrigerator until it's gone. Price good. You can't go wrong in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: Not organic or kosher at all!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Misleading. Has cancer causing chemicals in it but didn't let you know until you receive it. On the package! And its not returnable. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Smells like chemicals, do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bag that smelled terrible, like melted plastic. It is not edible. They replaced the first bag but won’t let me return the second. Do not buy, I can’t imagine it safe to eat based on the toxic smell.
customer_reviews.author: jtk6

customer_reviews.title: Very High Quality and Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I got these because of the word BEST that was highlighted by all caps and Amazon reinforced the point. I’ve bought Nature’s Bounty for many years and still prefer them, though. There cold milling process is much better in my mind because you still have a seed that is intact, not ground up. You may have a preference for the Viva Naturals. For me, the intact seed is more important. I’ll keep getting them, though, because of the fine quality and taste. I’ll just alternate between products.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S. Randall

customer_reviews.title: Delish!
customer_reviews.text: I add this to oatmeal, oatmeal bar and cookie recipes, cereal or yogurt; it's got a nutty delicious taste and is very digestible. Love it and highly recommend it for anyone wanting to improve their digestion, increase their Omegas and fiber and improve over all health. Also it's fairly priced and readily available, with speedy and free delivery via Amazon Prime. I do keep it refrigerated once opened to retain freshness, but I don't think that's necessary. So worth a try.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mixes Great and Provides Health Boost
customer_reviews.text: Great product at a reasonable price. Mix with water every morning as a quick health boost. Love all the omegas that has helped drop my cholesterol and blood pressure. Keep refrigerated for freshness. I also buy Cacao Powder to mix in my smoothies from Viva. They make great fresh products that I highly recommend. Flax are a great and well studied superfood! Has also helped my digestion.
customer_reviews.author: unhappy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GROUND FLAXSEED!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brand for a while now and it is about time for me to reorder. I use it just about daily in my steel cut oatmeal along with Hemp Hearts and I have been pleased with the taste which makes my oatmeal a power house breakfast and I put these in my oatmeal after cooking which cool the oatmeal down some. I also use it in other dishes. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Rancid.
customer_reviews.text: Rancid even though not expired. And amazon customer service is MIA so nothing can be done about it.
customer_reviews.author: Jace Keister

customer_reviews.title: Allergy alert
customer_reviews.text: So I decided to write a review after giving the product to a friend this is just a warning for people who may have allergies when you’re purchasing the product it doesn’t have the warning sign that it comes with once you get the product there’s a warning sign that says the product may contain nuts I have a nut allergy so that didn’t work out for me I wouldn’t of ordered it had I known that.I’m grateful that they added the warning sign however I wouldn’t of bought it at all if I knew it contain nuts so that was kind of annoying and a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Helps with digestion system and get rid of toxins
customer_reviews.text: Stays fresh in the refrigerator after opening. I love that. One of the reasons why I purchased this is because studies shows that flaxseeds helps with hormonal imbalances. So every morning, i mixed this in with my oatmeal & fruit bowl mix to aid my digestion system and control my hormonal acne. In addition with my weak loss goals to decrease my breast size. So far good. I’m only 1 week in to using this product. I will say, that since then my hormonal acne has been under control more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste is Better Than I Expected
customer_reviews.text: It has a slightly nutty flavor which is good for smoothies. I've tried adding it to my regular cooking, but the taste works well with some things and not others.
customer_reviews.author: sweden

customer_reviews.title: Adding flaxseed to improve my diet........
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the 15 oz size of Viva Labs organic flax. It arrive quickly and had great dating - 9/21/17 and it is April 2016 today. I am pleased that it is a product from near by Canada. I used it in homemade granola and will be trying it in shakes. I am new at trying to be healthy and am pleased with this product. Reminded to refrigerate it and what is a serving size. Glad to get a fresh product with fiber and Omega 3's.
customer_reviews.author: Cee-Cee

customer_reviews.title: From 5 STAR to 1 STAR ⭐️
customer_reviews.text: Update: I LOVED this product & have been eating it everyday in my oatmeal for nearly 8 months. Originally, I gave this flaxseed 5 stars until midway through my latest product order I noticed this label on the back about CANCER! I’m officially freaked out, hence the updated one star rating. 😳
customer_reviews.author: Janster

customer_reviews.title: HELPS YOU POOP!  KEEP IN FRIDGE.
customer_reviews.text: Tastes fresh. I add one tablespoon to my oatmeal for breakfast, along with a tablespoon of wheat germ. It helps me poop(sorry for the tmi!). I love the resealable bag. You have to keep in fridge after opening. If I take 2 tablespoons, it makes my system feel weird.
customer_reviews.author: big sis

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure it's great. But the packaging is awful
customer_reviews.text: No complaint about the product. I'm sure it's great. But the packaging is awful. One would think a quality product would come in a quality package. The problem here, as noted by several other reviewers, is the resealable bag doesn't reseal. Come on, Viva. How hard would it be to get it right???
customer_reviews.author: Toney

customer_reviews.title: Great Ground Flax Seed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product to help with my digestion. I use it in a lot of different dishes to get that extra fiber. Great taste also. I will definitely be buying more from this company.
customer_reviews.author: lib74

customer_reviews.title: Cancer and Reproductive Harm
customer_reviews.text: Back of package contained two stickers warning of "cancer and reproductive harm."
customer_reviews.author: Dan Leifker

customer_reviews.title: The facts about the flax
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big fan of all the natural additives and stuff, but I do need to get as much fiber as I can because of health issues. I bought this, quite affordably, to add to granola bars I make for lunches. Everyone in the family is getting more fiber, and it's not at all noticeable. The flax was finely ground, evenly textured, and really a pleasure to use.
customer_reviews.author: responder

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product , l was kind of aprehensive to try it after my Dr recomended to lower my colesteterol. But l am glad l did . first the flavor -there is none so you can mix it with anything and doesn't change the flavor at all . second , I am starting to feel more light ,not lighted head , but as if l was full with out eating too much. I will keep you updated with my colesterol numbers
customer_reviews.author: humberto

customer_reviews.title: Good source of extra fiber and vitamins!
customer_reviews.text: The flax seeds are gound finely. I add this into my daily drink of barley tea along with chia seeds. The flavor is good, seems pretty fresh. I personally thinks it's better grounded than the seed itself. There's enough in this bag for me to use for at least 6 months or more!
customer_reviews.author: ParkLife

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about using flax seed but after using it for a month I can tell the difference with my IBS problems. I keep it refrigerated and take 2 TBS a day mixed with water and I really like the nutty flavor. The bag is a ziplock bag that you can actually ziplock over and over which I like. I will be ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Rod

customer_reviews.title: This is excellent quality, it's already ground
customer_reviews.text: After researching the use of flax in my diet, I also had to find a company / product to buy it from. This is excellent quality, it's already ground, and I've begun to add flax to everything - yogurt, smoothies, baking, cereal, etc. Lots of health benefits but doesn't affect the taste so my husband doesn't even know, it's an easy way to eat healthier.
customer_reviews.author: Amy&Izzy

customer_reviews.title: Prime ground flax
customer_reviews.text: This is finely ground and a nice additive to foods. My complaint is the bag it’s in. It is disappointing that a higher price product would not have a better self seal bag. The bag itself is is goodbye quality but the self seal bag doesn’t close. I believe that the ground seeds got into the grooves. A self seal with deeper grooves might be better.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Best quality best flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different brands and have actually thrown away whole bags. This brand has great flavor and great texture. Some brands are powdery. This is not. I use on oats, in smoothies, on top of yogurt and in salads. I highly recommend. I am disappointed that the bigger bag is no longer available.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I add this stuff to my smoothies. I also occasionally add it to yogurt and other snacks for my toddler. I don't particularly enjoy flax in any other form, so this is a great product. And I love the Viva Naturals brand and have tried a variety of their products, and I love them all.
customer_reviews.author: IZ

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and healthy (but not for its omega 3s)
customer_reviews.text: Flaxseed is probably one of the most healthiest foods on the planet and this stuff is delicious. However, just because you're eating this stuff doesn't mean that you should stop eating fish. The omega 3s found in flaxseed (ALA) are only precursors to the healthy omega 3s found in fish (EPA and DHA) and the conversion process between the two is not 100 percent efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Returns??
customer_reviews.text: No return policy, but it arrived with a big hole in the bag (see photos). The product may be OK, but I'm not going to try it.
customer_reviews.author:
Philip
Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff here!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product contains omega 3's and fiber and adds a pleasing nutty flavor to your meals. The taste is good, and the product is fresh with an expiration date of January 2020. Highly recommend, I am very pleased with this product. Eating it with yogurt as I write this.
customer_reviews.author: Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Love This Product
customer_reviews.text: I use ground flax seed almost every day. I put it in gluten free pancakes, oatmeal and almost all of my gluten free baking recipes. I can't always find it in the stores where I live so being able to order it online is wonderful. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Trant

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product because of glowing reviews; however I didn't have the same experience. Hopefully maybe the package I received was bad or something, because it had an unpleasant flavor. It also had a smell like plastic, rather than the nutty scent the reviews are claiming. The bag was not outside of the expiration date, though. ended up throwing it out and buying the 365 brand instead. Definitely would not repurchase. I gave this two stars because Amazon shipped it so quickly..I received it in about a day.
customer_reviews.author: LNK

customer_reviews.title: Powder, but okay
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased ground flax seed, I didn't realize it would be so powdered. But I do like it. Sprinkle it on lots of food--both cold and hot whenever I think of it. It adds a good amount of fiber to my daily diet. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BJ777

customer_reviews.title: Warning label made me uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: After reading the warning label, I just couldn't enjoy using the product. The actual flax seed is fine and I would normally give it 5 stars. Instead I eventually dumped the last 1/2 of the bad and bought flax seed from Canada.
customer_reviews.author: Sunset

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: The ground flax seeds are very fine. It appears fresh. I use them With milk and in my curd. I can get ground flax seeds in my local grocery store, but there's not much selection and the bag is very small. This bag is large, which is a good deal for the price. Thanks for keeping good stuff under good price.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: I like that this is already ground so I can just ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is already ground so I can just put two tablespoons in my morning protein shake easily. I don't really notice a difference in taste. The flaxseed tends to sink to the bottom of my shake making the last few sips not as enjoyable. I don't really mind that, as how enjoyable are most protein shakes anyway? Sometimes it is a little hard to real seal, but not impossible. Overall I would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Grown in Canada where cadmium soil levels are LOW, ...
customer_reviews.text: Grown in Canada where cadmium soil levels are LOW, vs grown in the US or China where cadmium levels are more concerning.
customer_reviews.author: NorCalSteph

customer_reviews.title: It seems to be a good product.
customer_reviews.text: I am not an expert in nutrition, but as far as I can observe this is a good product: it looks good, evenly ground and have good shelf live in my pantry. I put some on my smoothies daily and I hope it is as healthful as it is praised for. If all remains the same I will keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: maclaren48

customer_reviews.title: Great taste but beware!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this ground flaxseed, it has a great taste, but as with all ground flaxseed you need to use it pretty quick and store it properly or it will go rancid.
customer_reviews.author: EJL

customer_reviews.title: Insects?
customer_reviews.text: After opening the bag to refill my storage container I noticed some webbing from some insect. Digging into the bag the web led to most of the flax being clumped around more webbing. I kept the bag sealed in a cabinet where no other items were plagued with the same infestation. I tossed it out before some bug could fly out and attack any other food items. Edit: upon emailing the company they quickly refunded my money and sent a replacement. They asked for photos to help in their investigation and said they would follow once they came to a conclusion.
customer_reviews.author: Mason Cheney

customer_reviews.title: Keto Treats!!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful alternative for keto and GF recipes! This arrived super fast, was well packaged, professionally delivered and is the absolute best quality!!! The bag is resealable and very durable!!!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Excellent source
customer_reviews.text: Truthfully, it's hard to be excited about flaxseed. It's for health reasons, I add one or two tablespoons of the ground to soy milk once a day, shake and drink down. I like this brand, flavor is okay.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harter

customer_reviews.title: Flaxseed works well and is great for my fruit smoothies
customer_reviews.text: Flaxseed works well and is great for my fruit smoothies. Give me a fullness when drinking one. Good deal for this. I like to put the package in a bigger ziplock baggie and keep in the freezer and use when needed.
customer_reviews.author: LuvND88

customer_reviews.title: Fine ground
customer_reviews.text: I buy this for my energy bites I make my kiddos. It’s super ground my kids have no idea it’s in the bites. It’s also great in smoothies and you can’t even taste it.
customer_reviews.author: ascarlett

customer_reviews.title: Easy to sprinkle on foods, etc.  well packaged.
customer_reviews.text: Putting a spoonful in my breakfast cereal or protein drink every morning. Doesn’t dissolve but it’s finely ground so no problem. Nice air tight resealable packaging. Price seems reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Spartacus

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Buck!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! Switched from my other brand which was good but this is better. Organic non gmo etc. Huge bag for small price. Dont forget to keep in fridge once opened.🙂
customer_reviews.author: kiwigal

customer_reviews.title: Works to keep the bowels moving
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be having a very positive effect on my constipation issues. Hope this continues.
customer_reviews.author: Shotcaller

customer_reviews.title: Finding More Foods to Mix It With
customer_reviews.text: This ground flax seed is very smooth. I like the "nutty" flavor it adds to cereals and other foods. My only problem with it is finding enough other foods to mix it with.
customer_reviews.author: Dendal

customer_reviews.title: ADD TO MANY FOODS!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this recently so I can't speak to the health benefits, but I'm happy that it really seems to have no flavor. I can add it to so many foods and not even know it is there.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Viva Makes Great Products
customer_reviews.text: Viva Makes Great Products. I Make Chocolate Pudding With Cacao Powder And Flax Seeds For A Healthy Chocolate Antioxidant For Anti Aging. It's Great For The Skin. First Add Hot Water To Flax Seeds. After It Coolspring Down Add Cacao Powder To Make A Healthy Antioxidant Chocolate Pudding.
customer_reviews.author: siam

customer_reviews.title: Terrible taste!  Ruined my smoothies.
customer_reviews.text: This product tastes awful!! When added to my veggie and fruit shakes I couldnt stand to drink them and threw it away. Tried in three shakes before realizing it was the culprit. Ughh.....be warned.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Smith-Knight

customer_reviews.title: ... product is by far and away some of the best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: I've tried many different brands of ground flaxseed and this product is by far and away some of the best I've tried!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, quality product
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted to add flaxseed to my diet but heard they were hard to grind and difficult to work with unground. I was happy to find this product. I add 2T to my daily smoothie. It adds a very mild, slightly nutty taste--but really, not much taste at all, so it doesn't overpower my smoothies. This is a great product and reasonably price. I'm on Subscribe and Save for this.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Good packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Very valuable to find ground flax so it can be used for part of the flour in a recipe. It mixes easily and retains flavor after cooking or baking. I recommend this product. I like to mix it with almond flour.
customer_reviews.author: Susan morton

customer_reviews.title: Zero Star
customer_reviews.text: I opened the bag and there was a cobweb-like string inside. I did not feel safe using the product. I was hoping to return it but it is ineligible for return. $16.99 wasted. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as fine powder as I was expecting; does not dissolve in water
customer_reviews.text: Not as fine powder as I was expecting; does not dissolve in water (I shouldn't have expected it to). If you intend to use it as a straight fiber supplement by mixing in water, it is a little on the flaky side, and a portion will sink to the bottom of the glass (need to continue to stir). Viva doesn't recommend it in water anyways, but that's how I'm taking it, alternating between this and psyllium husk powder.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Zoley

customer_reviews.title: BAG WAS ALREADY TAMPERED WITH!
customer_reviews.text: THE BAG WAS ALREADY OPENED AND THERE IS NO RETURN FOR THIS PRODUCT. CHECK RETURN POLICIES BEFORE BUYING. WHAT A WASTE!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Best we’ve tried so far
customer_reviews.text: Easy way to get your nutrients. It’s fresh and full of flavor. We add it to everything. Expiration date was one year from now. Keep it in the fridge after opening or if your not using it right away store it in the freezer.
customer_reviews.author: Gary D.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and flavor. I use two scoops in my morning smoothie and, also, sprinkle on greek yogurt.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Organic ground flax seed
customer_reviews.text: Delicious. I put a spoonful in my oatmeal at breakfast. Very healthy and it tastes so good. The package keeps it fresh. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Ground Flaxseed at a very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great consistency. I use a heaping table spoon on my morning fruit, cereal and nuts. I keep it refrigerated after opening for maximum freshness
customer_reviews.author: Richard Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Fresh and available
customer_reviews.text: I add 2 tablespoons of flaxseed meal to my morning smoothie. It’s Good for the gut and loaded with vitamins and good fats. And no getting between the teeth whole flaxseed with it being ground.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Peck

customer_reviews.title: Very fresh and tasty
customer_reviews.text: I have used flaxseed for years on my morning cereal. This particular brand is very tasty and fresh. I will continue to use this every morning.
customer_reviews.author: sissy

customer_reviews.title: Flaxseed: I am pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product as a way of adding more omega 3 to my diet (as an alternative to chia seeds). Out of the bag it has a bland flavor (but who eats ground flaxseed out of the bag). So far, I have added it to smoothies, oatmeal, and beans. In each case, I found the addition delicious and I am happy to say that I have experienced no digestive problems.
customer_reviews.author: tekno-maniac

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I use a lot of ground flax seed and this brand seems to be a good quality as far as I can tell. I like to add it to smoothies, cereals, cookies, quick breads, and many other things to add fiber and nutrition. I've read that your body gets more from the ground flax seed than the whole so that's why I use ground. It has become a staple for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: best I've had, very good for flaxmeal
customer_reviews.text: I've tried three flaxmeals and Viva Naturals is definitely the best: Viva Naturals - 5 stars - fresh, tastes fine, and is fine ground - can't say I'm a fan of flaxmeal but it is fairly easy to eat Swanson - 4 stars - edible, fresh, cheap, but is a much rougher grind and harder to eat Now - golden flaxmeal - 1 star - rancid, got a prompt refund from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Lund Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: cancer & reproductive warning
customer_reviews.text: this has a cancer & reproductive warning on the product. hence did not try.
customer_reviews.author: baby peach

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly working for Vegan Baking!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my first vegan brownie home-baking. This worked very well with 'flaxseed egg' and the final brownie. So satisfied. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Actually is the Best
customer_reviews.text: I was using another brand of ground flaxseed but found it was course and hard to go down. I had to actually chew and chew for it to swallow. I tried Viva and wow, a much better product. Just the right grind, not too fine, not too course, just right. Thank you Viva! You are actually thee BEST.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Wonner

customer_reviews.title: Tastes awful
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited about trying this, I put it in a smoothie and it tasted terrrrible.. I love the health benefits and it seems like a good product overall but I was so disappointed that I hated the taste, there is no way I’ll use it, waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product already opened / tampered with!
customer_reviews.text: Looked like someone had already cut it open when I received it. It was leaking as you can see in the photo. I discarded it as someone could have easily tampered with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Best ground flaxseed I have ever tasted!
customer_reviews.text: I am using flaxseed on a daily basis and usually drink it in 1/2 cup of almond milk. This is the best tasting flaxseed I ever had - and I tried many kinds over the years. It mixes very good with the milk (I have not tried it in oatmeal or yoghurt yet) and it helps me with my digestive system!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: VERY GOOD
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE TRIED NUMEROUS BRANDS OF FLAX SEED OVER TIME, AND THIS IS THE BEST TASTING FLAX SEED I HAVE EVER TRIED. IT ALSO SEEMS MORE FINELY GROUND WHICH MAKES IT EASIER TO MIX IN MY PROTEIN DRINK.
customer_reviews.author: lyndyhen

product_meta.title: Viva Naturals Organic Ground Flax Seed, 30 oz - Specially Cold-milled Using Proprietary Technology for Optimal Smoothness and Freshness
product_meta.description:
Size:1.87 Pound (Pack of 1)Viva Naturals Organic Ground Flaxseed is your next smoothie mix-in, all-natural fiber substitute and healthy culinary secret! 

Heart Protection - Flaxseed naturally contains heart-boosting lignans, powerful phenols that are clinically shown to boost heart health and promote healthy cholesterol levels. For further heart protection, benefit from our flaxseed’s rich fiber content, providing 3g of dietary fiber per serving. 

Improve Digestive Health - The natural oils in our flaxseed help lubricate the digestive tract to improve regularity and support everyday intestinal health. 

The Viva Naturals Difference 
Our flax crops grow in the Central Plains of Canada under full sunlight and cool winds to yield the best tasting flax seeds. Using a proprietary cold-milling method, our seeds are ground at cool temperatures and never heated, preserving essential omega-3’s and powerful phytonutrients for an extended shelf-life and optimal benefits. Our unique sifting system reduces the presence of whole or broken seeds to ensure a uniform consistency and soft texture. Certified organic and non-GMO, our ground flaxseed provides a hefty amount of dietary fiber and essential fatty acids in every serving.
feature_bullets: BOOST HEART HEALTH - Viva Naturals uses a proprietary cold-milling method that protects omega-3’s from the effects of oxidation, supporting a healthy heart and promoting greater cardiovascular benefits.

IMPROVE GUT HEALTH NATURALLY - Our flax seeds are finely ground to the softest grade for a higher fiber content and smooth consistency. Each serving provides 3g of dietary fiber for optimal digestive health and regularity

FEEL FULLER LONGER - A combination of fiber and protein helps keep you satisfied all day long by curbing hunger and cravings. Each serving of Viva Naturals’ flaxseed provides 3g of vegan protein, making it suitable for all diets!
VERSATILE KITCHEN STAPLE - Our flaxseed adds a pleasant nutty flavor to foods while boosting everyday nutrition. Blends seamlessly in cereals, desserts, smoothies and more.
CERTIFIED ORGANIC & NON-GMO - Viva Naturals Organic Ground Flaxseed is allergen friendly and is sourced from select Canadian farmers for the finest quality guaranteed!
